thread.title: FIFA 16 Title Update Out on PC, Coming Later to Xbox One and PlayStation 4 - newsR
thread.title_full: FIFA 16 Title Update Out on PC, Coming Later to Xbox One and PlayStation 4 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: FIFA 16 Title Update Out on PC, Coming Later to Xbox One and PlayStation 4 - newsR
text: Video game developer EA Sports is announcing that it is currently deploying a title update for the PC version of FIFA 16, which is designed to deliver a range of improvements for the core mechanics and to deal with some issues that the community has been signaling. The full list of changes introduced to the football simulation can be read by clicking on the button at the end of this article. EA Sports is making some big changes to the goalkeepers, apparently eager to mak... Â»
